Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: oman54
Reviews.Content: overall nice place room clean comfortable staff excellent problem within five area nice good chairs sit sunny areas front desk pleasant side quiet area 12 min walk walk although night women might like walk since quiet looks like grocery store going across street place buy water snacks without paying silly hotel prices weeks breakfast good hotel sure price since got hilton members night 4 adults room happy

Reviews.Title: “Hotel is located in one best locations of Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: vinylmeister
Reviews.Content: didnt problems one complained room tiny rest us decent sized room staff friendly hotel clean safe close cocowalk tourist shopping area walk across street landing little place water get acceptable type food watch boats

Reviews.Title: “Good Location”
Reviews.Author: maldita1010
Reviews.Content: spent last nite cruise trip key west hotel street minutes walk downtown coconut grove biscayne bay nice views upper floors bay key biscayne although immediately across street hotel bay boat storage facilities could nicer view staff extremely nice helpful upgraded us 10th floor room balcony charge hilton room average size king bed bathroom large tub shower sinks bidet room clean well large tv well wet bar side room parking valet call room waiting reach lobby hotel nice obviously favorite many airline flight downside stay bad hallways something noticed several hotels area

Reviews.Title: “Nice but noisy on the street side”
Reviews.Author: scizin
Reviews.Content: stayed doubletree one night early december 2004 2 adjoining rooms faced construction construction block away problem noise noticed rooms nice furnishings bed sofa chairs tables rooms decent bathrooms bit small breakfast particularly nice biscuits kind fancy fruit etc slight negative side hotel much either lobby small doesnt anything fancy used pool felt smaller side also heated warm still overall happy stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location in such a fun town.”
Reviews.Author: Jody F
Reviews.Content: first time dikker thijs hotel tidy hotel well placed leidesplein nightlife offer trams run adjacent entrance cant hear rooms good size nice clean im october may stay come main entrance turn right 200 metres right fantastic cocktail lounge

Reviews.Title: “To be recommended”
Reviews.Author: Simon B
Reviews.Content: choose dikker thijs hotel location hotel located close amsterdams leidseplein middle amsterdams heart perfect location visit amsterdam feet anyway better leave car safe place visit center walking booked room view prinsengracht room spacious large bathroom bed room sitting area breakfast continental breakfast omelettes bacon variety dutch cheese meats service reception efficient positive one best locations amsterdam spacious room negative pricy car parking facilities wifi included room price

Reviews.Title: “Amsterdam Magic”
Reviews.Author: Quentin_Sargent
Reviews.Content: hotel situated prinsengracht find almost places visit near hotel also near night life amsterdam room clean nice bathroom tub rooms soundproof room isnt big sufficient since amsterdam sightseeing

Reviews.Title: “a little pearl in amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: rikduyck
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights attending trade show bad weather walk tram would long luck enjoyed 10 minute stroll town past flower market hotel staff nice location great except room faced main road noise night unbearable saw rooms nice mine plain showers first room asked move room full bath hotel happy accomodate night couldnt get sleep realize first room albeit nice would better choice

Reviews.Title: “Great staff, great location, can be a little noisy”
Reviews.Author: quesochica
Reviews.Content: great location canal part town leidseplein walk everywhere hotel staff gracious knowledgeable helpful room lovely surprise large spacious clean well appointed one hotels equipped elevator amsterdam narrow complaint would tram right outside window sleep earplugs suites hotel much larger super quiet course expensive couldnt beat location staff might also recommend small corner across street

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in great location”
Reviews.Author: Pawel_EPWR
Reviews.Content: hotel great location overlooking canal couldnt better perfectly situated museums galleries sites short walk room paid overlooking canal roomy light comfortable didnt eat hotel would options nearby breakfast everyone says eat nearby cafe surprisingly quiet one well located

Reviews.Title: “Good spot”
Reviews.Author: paulde
Reviews.Content: perfect location old amsterdam ideal business pleasure hotel located busy part amsterdam plenty restaurants bars area good business right tram line

Reviews.Title: “Great Location!”
Reviews.Author: juan070
Reviews.Content: dikker thijs small well located hotel near clean well furnished public transport nearby

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: jan4
Reviews.Content: staff hotel really great efficient friendly room expecting tiny little closet often case older cities instead gave us triple room extra twin bed addition small comfortable location hotel central three major tram lines walkable museum district area lot tourist hotels restaurants good easy find morning coffee store also bad noisy corner new years whole city noisy super light sleeper id say request quiet room choose quieter neighborhood us excellent choice

Reviews.Title: “Not worth 4 stars, but good location”
Reviews.Author: sanji
Reviews.Content: good location everything within walking distance staff professional friendly room spacious could feel comfortable bath products nice bathroom room also though tub even though one could easily fit nice view channel breakfast good expensive free available

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay near everything.”
Reviews.Author: delaplanche
Reviews.Content: superior room big comfortable clean much noise mostly penthouse would go

Reviews.Title: “5 Star Location with 3 Star Rooms...”
Reviews.Author: Flamenco_Sun
Reviews.Content: stayed wife 3 nights 1st oct birthday present large double 2nd floor bedroom bathroom spotlessly clean reviews well aware noise level trams late night missed breakfast went bed late would struggle get early tea coffee making facilities room starbucks hotel staff nice helpful location minute leidesplein bars restaurants coffee shops night clubs near museums next stay surely dikker

Reviews.Title: “underrated excellence”
Reviews.Author: CelestialNomad
Reviews.Content: son stayed 4 nights mid september large room twin beds seating area doors balcony overlooking canal booked canal view room given one anyway room 2nd floor around corner noise trams late night werent bothered breakfast 2 occasions plenty choice somewhat price 17 staff mostly pleasant one staff member pretty disinterested answering room poor signal mostly used lounge area 2nd floor internet access thought overall rather expensive location central museums anne frank house lovely jordaan use hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great staff and location..would definitely return!”
Reviews.Author: BridUiChadhla
Reviews.Content: room disappointment bed packed 2 walls means possibility go bed feet side space put glasses watch furthermore room overall noisy seemed weak wrote email staff mention points never received answer

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: BusyJane
Reviews.Content: well located channels beautiful view bathroom spacious clean room kind helpfull staff ice machine could provided least ground floor

Reviews.Title: “This is a gem in the coolest city I have ever visited!”
Reviews.Author: BeckiBoo24
Reviews.Content: oh start reviews location hotel perfect getting main attractions galleries amsterdam foot price pay convenience noise exactly picturesque position beautiful city yes hotel wonderful prinsengracht canal also terribly busy corner opposite shop shop main drag leidesplein want romantic quiet canal definitely isnt want heart action though give room overlooked main street noisy probably well early hours room also aircon fan provided right next bed stay way noisy window open rooms arent comparable 4 star hotels ive stayed 3 star perfectly comfortable except air con corridors etc real let poor dark depressing feel find reception staff friendly efficient plus points however maid service bizarre literally someone hanging around outside door waiting us leave breakfast day wasnt late way around happened 3 days waiting us leave would inside room wed even reached stairs kind kind amsterdam 1 night id consider place convenience longer stay id seeking somewhere bit quieter note give hotel good review average would mean reality somewhere two ie plain old good alas theres option

Reviews.Title: “We want to come back”
Reviews.Author: hmendonca
Reviews.Content: location hotel ideal within walking distance art museums hotel sits corner street leads happening plaza filled restaurants bars would definitely return hotel staff front desk could little friendly

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: Emelda
Reviews.Content: first impression hotel checkin alas lady unfriendly almost rude order get things going get room leave reception room nice would expect hotel 4 star category would rate 3star furniture worn average better hotels amsterdam mention staff almost made us leave without third disappointment bed placed wall could hear details neighbours bathroom fortunately wake already 630 windows streets noise guess nothing would expect better 4star hotel worst hotel weve amsterdam pity location perfect pick another one plenty around

Reviews.Title: “brilliant hotel in excellent location”
Reviews.Author: hpm66
Reviews.Content: stayed dikker thijs hotel 3 nights enjoyed much room comfortable clean didnt canal view big window facing street lot light coming even though located one amsterdams busiest streets double windows extremely effective keeping noise staff seems nice helpful location excellent touring amsterdam walking distance main attractions tram station outside hotel lots bars restaurants coffee shops near considering reasonable pricing great value money highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Good location on the channel district”
Reviews.Author: sten_80
Reviews.Content: room great lots windows open fun view clean sink water work one night help offered even bottle water checked couple checking said internet never worked got work free 30 minutes pay elevator work one morning evening staff added night said would problem forgot told room taken night leave also lock doors whenever leaves desk sign notice even back 5 minutes dont care breakfast overpriced goes 930 coffee bagel place corner much cheaper friendlier

Reviews.Title: “Great view !”
Reviews.Author: Nelsworth
Reviews.Content: recently stayed dikker thijs hotel amsterdam couples loved room roof original wood great view prinsengracht staff friendly definitely enjoyed stay stayed also dinner newly opened restaurant thijs basement great food italian style loved wines birthday husband rented private dining facility made dinner intimate special really recommend great place go back amsterdam well book

Reviews.Title: “loud, aged and overprized”
Reviews.Author: anhei
Reviews.Content: ive amsterdam multiple times business pleasure business trip hotel came pocket bargain found great rate bookingcom hotel third conference hotel rate couldnt happier room 4th floor spacious room clean comfortable friendly staff always generous breakfast lovely restaurant basement level hotel situated literally steps away three major tram lines half block away starbucks free wireless secret able attend conference explore old visit friends easily via public transport couldnt asked better base free wireless guests get times folks woman traveling alone felt secure ill back

Reviews.Title: “Very rude staff, old uncomfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: R-Almeida
Reviews.Content: arranged last minute amsterdam experienced shock find nice room nice section city one charm beauty spent several hours looking online kept coming back dikker thijs hotel secured 2 rooms hotel upon arriving happy see rooms large comfortable nicely appointed overlooking canal smoke free also price didnt break bank hotel situated accessible part city close everywhere also tram line would definitely stay get breakfast choice recommendations warned several bakeries shops nearby served us well also offer 15 minutes free wireless believe ran 25 comparison hotels seem positives many negatives must turn hotel key leave room problem least 3 times came back hotel front desk front door locked front desk took several minutes someone arrive let us back hotel seemed desk although staff helpful asked another thing found heavy blocking emergency exit hotel moved noticed

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel and Location”
Reviews.Author: jess_2419
Reviews.Content: hotel location good channel district next leidseplein good connections tram room spacious unfortunately didnt channel views hand peaceful sleep without street breakfast wasnt good value money

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Matty43
Reviews.Content: shocked see last couple reviews experience opposite turned hotel chance looking room overlooking canals girl reception polite helpful offered us room overlooking canal reasonable rate looked standards prices two previous hotels way certainly say one better hotels amsterdam room good size clean great view 4th floor little noisey night city break hustle bustle wanted

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: IsraelMichal
Reviews.Content: stayed superior room one night march 2011 room large still small bed small desk arriving room heated freezing cold overlooking street heard tram going every couple minutes uncomfortable background noise curtains close properly room lit night front desk staff showed working overall wouldnt stay

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Dragos68
Reviews.Content: location ok near leidseplein far dam jordaan clean room old hotel room dark small claustrophobic window facing depressing noisy ventilation matress uncomfortable poor bathroom poor breakfast ten expensive stairs stairs stairs suitable people difficulties old slow lift worst hotel unfriendly rude staff never met people like life 4 star hotel decent standard would 23 star hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good location, good value, nice staff.”
Reviews.Author: jjxxtt
Reviews.Content: dikker thijs hotel great stayed night feb 2011 since slow season assume upgraded room awesome room loved im sure room would like price paid room got definitely amazing hotel allowed well great travel lot dog reviews complain noise street didnt encounter room corner room tram stop great location way 4th floor windows closed winter may summer overall great friendly place would definitely stay amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Nice location, but loud!”
Reviews.Author: Ninge712
Reviews.Content: staff helpful friendly room clean comfortable excellent location good tram stops outside hotel going sightseeing lots bars restaurants shops near hotel even though hotel near bars trams never found noisy night

Reviews.Title: “Unfriendly welcome”
Reviews.Author: AlfredENeumann
Reviews.Content: nice hotel clean friendly helpful nice location good breakfast buffet

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, perfect location!”
Reviews.Author: Dalaigh
Reviews.Content: stayed one night pleasant time staff helpful friendly room huge easily biggest hotel room ive stayed europe two things didnt care tram noise rather loud room beds way hard liking

Reviews.Title: “What a party location!”
Reviews.Author: carollinga
Reviews.Content: stay good super great think might chosen wrong location wasnt close dam square hoped area close many many restaurants fairly close amsterdam rijksmuseum shopping amsterdam pretty awesome seems good shopping strip everywhere room second floor pretty quiet didnt hear noise nights stayed internet free 15 minutes day hour fairly good main reason isnt fourstar rating mainly location really fault rather hotels staff nice helpful room good size bathroom pretty clean breakfast hotel rather choosing eat breakfast surrounding cafes really enjoyed amsterdam would preferred stay closer centre

Reviews.Title: “ok for a tourist not so great for business traveller”
Reviews.Author: ta2306
Reviews.Content: spent two nights hotel good time room 5th floor incredible view city looked like renovated staff reception rooms kind hope come back soon

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely recommend !!!”
Reviews.Author: Vienna76
Reviews.Content: always booked paid advance expensive hotel arrive employees think guest even though paid advance wanted credit card details needed case would break something strange attitude guest cannot simply say ok ill skip trip go somewhere else knowing hotels fully booked less policy honest hotels really welcome guests appreciate coming perhaps im wrong really positive yes negative points mention could forget welcome two nights

Reviews.Title: “Pretty good”
Reviews.Author: JNW
Reviews.Content: originally recommended friend dikker en thijs disappoint staff friendly helpful rooms spacious extremely clean beds comfortable noise minimal want absolute silence dont come leidseplein tram centraal walked straight door went leidseplein night home 2 minutes without worry taxis trams etc reception staff helped us tram info friends staying side town patient informative also got great room fantastic view canal didnt even request canal view room cant wait go back amsterdam cant wait go back hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great room, noisy location”
Reviews.Author: dlev4
Reviews.Content: hotel quiet comfortable arrived early day able check right fantastic 10 hour flight even canal view everything youve read location right long days exploring getting lost great party numerous leidesplein clubs eat restaurants especially october gets dark early door policy keeps hotel feeling safe secure clean friendly

Reviews.Title: “Hot & noisy - otherwise nice large, clean room.”
Reviews.Author: jazzangel
Reviews.Content: colleague stayed hotel 2 nights good points great location friendly staff large rooms mainly clean free internet lobby 15 mins day bad points slight noise night didnt keep us awake imagine low floor light sleeper would bathroom tiles need cleaned rest room spotless bathroom tiles look like hadnt cleaned towels call thing toilet paper size tea towel room service advertised visit room service room say 4 hours night deliver food room cost 5 extra contact reception room service mini bar snacks drinks free water slippers minor points business traveller honest need slippers bathroom tiles hotel bar shut sunday really worth going rest week quite depressing cant comment breakfast didnt eat think need bed central place sightseeing weekend wont spending much time room hotel adequate business traveller someone wants basic would rate average 3 star hotel

Reviews.Title: “SIMPLY AMAZING!”
Reviews.Author: PSMaka
Reviews.Content: overall hotel pleasing effective room good decor amenities one could need good assortment buffet breakfast morning time place hotel good relation transport several bars shop close suggested alternative would absolutely traveling amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: clbr5
Reviews.Content: stayed first two nights amsterdam later moved hotel jordaan area good location ideal esp first time amsterdam noise problem ask room boring decor overpriced

Reviews.Title: “Terrific Place!”
Reviews.Author: dontbeugly
Reviews.Content: looking well appointed spacious room nice sitting area sleep anything dont mind sleeping ear plugs great place stay location blessing corner prinsengracht puts reasonable walking distance much amsterdam adjacent one popular restaurant night life areas dont feel like walking problem tram runs directly front hotel lies drawback trams run every minutes 600 midnight people coming bars make way food establishments across hotel often singing shouting couple hours week morning weekend heavy sleeper ear plugs able third night noises evening issue outside noise loved hotel would guess could get room far away possible room facing street noise wont issue

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: Jorch67
Reviews.Content: without doubt hotel room ever stayed impossible leave windows open street noise outside unbearable wee hours im sure tourist location excellent really central need sleep get days work unless sleep anything dont stay rooms well sized clean well equipped however

Reviews.Title: “Well located, efficient staff”
Reviews.Author: MaineIzzy
Reviews.Content: great hotel service great front desk helpful anything wasnt room would let us borrow iron microwave computer could use access internet lobby room second floor facing street amazing husband dont mind street noise metro actually liked location wise great near touristy area near nice outdoor seating area referred restaurant row perfect low key nightlife area keep short nothing like hotel really pleased location service rooms

Reviews.Title: “Well located for seeing the sights”
Reviews.Author: The_Aitchs
Reviews.Content: colleague stayed 3 nights heading conference amsterdam fabulous city dikker thijs great location access tram restaurants room large great view window right sign side building along room think called deluxe double bit pricey clean good service breakfast every day little cafe hotel good might suitable alternatives worked great us negative thing would bit noisy night near popular square people late singing streets

Reviews.Title: “Mediocre Hotel With Some Quiks”
Reviews.Author: StarVox
Reviews.Content: frequent visitor amsterdam stayed many hotels city centre hotel location two times stayed front desk attendants helpful wont stay

Reviews.Title: “A pleasant, wonderfully situated hotel”
Reviews.Author: bajesma
Reviews.Content: rooms 1st floor next tram stops away street noise stayed good noise insulation windows room pretty small odd smell clean nice bed cosy interior minibar tv bathroom average enough big handle two persons nice shower cold floor breakfast bit disappointment cereal breakfast much 20 places nearby buy decent breakfast wait till 10am get breakfasts leaving city hotel says 4star hotel would say 3star good though nearby hotel enough bars restaurants eat drink almost ever want indian food nice hard rock cafe normal two italian good chinese takeaway ok nearby trams numbers 1 5 takes central train station shopping district museum district places anyway 2 away hotel easy move around walking way airport easy take train airport amsterdam train station take tram 1 5 hotel easy

Reviews.Title: “Great location, big room, helpful front desk staff”
Reviews.Author: RossOttawa
Reviews.Content: stayed two nights room large room double bed actually two twin beds pushed together big bathroom nice view canal sitting area looks canal windows open wide inroom coffee maker mini fridge huge bathroom natural light room gets lots light helpful efficient staff room faced quiet side street around corner tons shops coffee shops bars stores restaurants easy walk anne frank house van gogh museum tram right door beds hard european beds always seem way layout floors bit unusual get room took elevator go flight stairs bit tricky luggage help finding room carrying luggage offered found housekeeper kindly helped trouble sleeping tram noise noticeable upstairs neighbors apparently family may walking normally nature rooms

Reviews.Title: “Great location, clean & tidy rooms, friendly, helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: CHMcK
Reviews.Content: hotel right tram stop prinsengracht canal perfectly situated shops restaurants comfortable spacious room 2nd floor window thijs sign outside building room wellequipped minibar tea coffee making facilities lovely shower room complimentary toiletries face think rooms must recently faint smell paint air room shower room spotlessly clean could hear noise trams lots people around night pretty tired walking around sights slept really well anyway didnt get breakfast hotel instead got croissants across street lovely highly recommended comfortable hotel great location want close main tourist parts amsterdam would stay

Reviews.Title: “Fab Location”
Reviews.Author: JoBNorfolk_England
Reviews.Content: stayed early january 2010 quite seems reviews decent enough lobby small building like may oddly shaped elevator since room listed second floor actually fourth floor elevator goes second floor even desk told us second floor room number started 2 get drag luggage flights stairs hotel knows never offered assistance room supposedly one better room furnished sparse generally clean overall dont pay 125 us per night id recommend location convenient otherwise indifferent staff less memorable atmosphere makes give thumbs use restaurant get breakfast cant rate

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant small hotel, excellent location”
Reviews.Author: BostonTraveler62
Reviews.Content: stayed partner november found room clean spacious location staff helpful would hesitate staying

Reviews.Title: “Very noisy rooms, not that nice, good location”
Reviews.Author: CAHBoulderCO
Reviews.Content: got lovely room first floor overlooking canal beautiful spacious room reading lots reviews saying lack space amsterdam rooms general friends get small room back building though view buildings paying extra canal view definitely worth good location easy get main attractions eight us stayed said wed definitely stay future return amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “no doubt that this is the place to stay in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: viajante2009
Reviews.Content: moment arrived quaint hotel along canal received best care pleasant service luggage stored small holding room room ready invited coffee breakfast room got lucky room ready much quicker anticipated able hitting streets amsterdam close american hotel plaza canal stop rijksmuseum along bus route bank atm small shops postcards snacks nearby quiet room large bath small balcony overlooking city go back next time visit amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Classy hotel in good location but can be noisy”
Reviews.Author: HelmutSchnitzel
Reviews.Content: wife america visiting three days picked dikker thijs hotel canal view werent disappointed room big opened view canal room lots character charm note room looked much different luxury rooms website still satisfied step door youre right next tram stop take anywhere city get prinsengracht stop youre right front hotel youre right leidesplein bustling area lots restaurants bars shops street fun attractions noise street continue wee hours morning youre looking quiet might mind much since felt like center activity staff helpful arrived early held suitcases room ready able help us find major attractions kind us entered left building two minor negatives 1 wireless internet access bit expensive slow charged us wasnt nearly fast reliable used hotels travel magic jack call home free internet wasnt fast enough support 2 double room like many european hotels put two beds together make double beds kept sliding around floor lot however overall pleased would return hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very happy with our stay.”
Reviews.Author: allesvoorjouw
Reviews.Content: perfect location easy walk tourist attractions lazy cold tram stops within door gorgeous view room right onto canal lots restaurants within less 5 min walk room gorgeous large got package deal included breakfast wouldnt pay theres bakery across street since included went every day enjoyed plentiful fresh delicious breakfast clean sunny dining room staff pleasant polite cons beds really really firm pay internet wasnt problem us stairs way room got elevator hallways quite narrow

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: LNMP
Reviews.Content: stayed three nights part bike tour trip amsterdam paris shocked large room bathroom spacious clean view canal front hotel wonderful little noisy outside evening closed large windows quiet safe bike parking hotel found bike parking garage far away great hotel money various people front desk helpful

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: YouKnowItLeicester
Reviews.Content: moment walked door moment walked hotel catered every need rented penthouse four days reasonable price included breakfast first morning brought room course lavish spread also fresh dozen waiting us got evening view city amsterdam room amazing space large kingsized bed super comfy wed read reviews noise right corner main stop trams never heard thing loved

Reviews.Title: “Ask for room 504!”
Reviews.Author: stellaz74
Reviews.Content: stayed dikker thijs room little warm opened window tram side noisy till wee hours morning village nyc wasnt unbearable found staff courteous professional room large comfortable clean would definitely stay perhaps asking room canal

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, comfort & service”
Reviews.Author: chatnoiruk
Reviews.Content: stayed one night left impression much would stay business family price right good points excellent location pleasant staff room brilliant huge balcony floor ceiling windows overlooking central amsterdams rooftops facing good points although room spotless reason bathroom areas dust allowed eg mirror frame top radiator actual clean though also wasnt happy ridiculous breakfast think eat fine second option one glass juice one one cup coffee rather better one option second option large corporate hotel public areas limited reception tiny theres one small lift didnt affect stay good solid 3 star hotel

Reviews.Author: NandJWales
Reviews.Content: stayed previously room back view clean functional stayed fantastic room front view canal got bargain price 4 nights busy exciting area leidseplein great nightlife still bustling 3am need bed crash cannot better hotel

Reviews.Title: “Horrible!!! Do Not Even Consider It!!!”
Reviews.Author: Transcontinent
Reviews.Content: lovely place complaints expedia mainly lack restaurant rude man front desk honestly didnt problems single room facing conveniently located across tram stop street museums walking distance wonderful assortment shops visiting near xmas beautiful weather warm snow compared traveled snow place would definitely travel hotel

Reviews.Title: “A Solid 3 Star....Great Location”
Reviews.Author: clarelw
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights august 2 different rooms first room nice back building room thus overlooking internal service courtyard facing air conditioning unit asking room view view would nice told none available ask morning also discovered bathroom tap night ok door shut hot water bathroom leaking wall using shower wasnt much water coming told reception next morning asking another room suspect got good room owner receptionist â€“ delighted new room much bigger balcony set roof overlooking rooftops canal bathroom refurbished power shower large window room judging fire escape door one biggest rooms apart penthouse would definitely stay room location good near leidesplein walked everywhere tram stop right outside lots bars restaurants within minutes walking museums 1520 mins walk red light district approx flower market 1015 mins breakfast wasnt included quite expensive went nearby cafes theres nice bar hotel always empty never used never even saw staff appeared open music playing

Reviews.Title: “What a location!”
Reviews.Author: cckone
Reviews.Content: second stay dikker thijs hotel found great time last time mid week height summer hot couple days 29 c air conditioning worked well comfortable room immaculate comfy beds want peace quiet quite difficult find centre amsterdam capital city maybe go hotel take earplugs sleep thru anything manager peter extremely welcoming helpful staff encountered

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: CADreamin
Reviews.Content: means fourstar hotel seedy dirty airconditioning rooms actually mine hot stuffy opened window let enormous amount street noise continued well midnight one point found phone squeeze behind desk find phone jack closet hanging clothes space clothes yet space set suitcase live one positive feature inroom coffee maker need clean â€“ even former guests noticed flying room â€“ probably need open windows screens make stay hotel depressing experience

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable but not congenial”

Reviews.Content: worst hotel ever stayed supposed four star way end eight week trip well definately felt like something spoilt hotel doesnt even rate 2 stars idea got four star rating foyer barely big enough put bags lift didnt fit us 2 bags lift doesnt doors stops floor hallway doors look like something junior high bathroom toilet stains carpet room restaurant couple tables stale bread breakfast cupboard wardrobe didnt hanging rack beds small chair broken one chair tv didnt work minibar room service dont think room seen cleaner since end oh yeah balcony view even big enough fit broken chair two nice view pleasant could get anywhere else amsterdam staff friendly oh anne franks house please please please waste money staying must places stay

Reviews.Title: “Great stay !!!!!”
Reviews.Author: line67
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights fri 21st march march booked paid euros total standard double room flew schipol airport caught train central station person arrival caught tram 1 2 5 person pay back tram stop handy right outside hotel hotel outside looks lovely checked problems room ready us handy requested canal view room got room stayed average size honest felt little disappointed entered room general ok needs bit layout also unusual sink area actual room room consisted double bed comfy fab pillows best ever hotel desk table chair flat screen tv phone tea coffee making facilities minibar wardrobe much drawer space bathroom tiny shower curtain although clean shower area could breakfast typically dutch bread cheese meats eggs cakes cereals jams yogurts etc made breakfast found variety good served 1030am weekends 930am could also breakfast served room additional person although noise trams etc never bothered us problems sleeping location hotel fantastic leidsplein area 1 min walk great bars restaurants around piano bar lot fun although drinks pricey walk dam 20 mins red light district area surrounding hotel busy bar basement used meet friends ones nice also free coffee teas residents safety deposit boxes available behind reception free charge dont lose key charge also luggage storage room internet pc available reception charge required hand room key leave hotel collect return one thing note although us dont soft hard policy hotel place found overall enjoyed stay get good price worth staying wouldnt pay night standard room though ps trams caught central station airport walked everywhere else nothing ever took us longer 30 mins get including red light district anne franks house rijksmuseum questions feel contact

Reviews.Title: “Had a great stay in this hotel.”

Reviews.Content: traditional hotel excellent location sights amsterdam reached foot stops front hotel dont even think car amsterdam hotel staff efficient exactly warm welcoming included dutch breakfast boiled eggs yoghurt fresh fruit juices various breads cold cuts cheeses excellent breakfast room furnished comfortably music background breakfast served lunch dinner free wifi building including rooms traveling without laptop use computer lobby pay 5 euro approx 8 minimum one hour use inconvenient expected rooms facing street double windows blocking street sounds bathrooms remodeled spotless well kept one quirky thing elevator doors closed opened sometimes elevator stuck floor guest realize doors open elevator moving

Reviews.Title: “Had been expecting a Bit More, though good location”

Reviews.Content: didnt problem majority staff however definitely need help area hotel room needed updating especially bathroom area bed comfortable room clean everything required first little room location back hotel brought staff told travel agent requested quiet room since night hundreds streets outside hotel given quiet room back hotel talking several guests rooms street kept awake noise didnt view room much first arrived even probably room entire trip big plus hotels location next tram stop near lot shopping areas many great restaurants

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Hotel, Great location and staff”
Reviews.Author: hilly10
Reviews.Content: stayed six days enjoyed comfortable room reasonably quiet everything room good shape got feeling however staff liked everything except dealing customers several times waited desk two finish deal us several times one front desk wait outside main hotel door locked desk attendant came back opened door late night way midday staff polite correct way seemed guests extend one second longer necessary took holland easy place get around didnt need help much anyway aware restaurants nearby leidesplein overpriced tourist mediocre food fortunately great sandwich shop directly across canal many decent places short walk away

Reviews.Title: “Pros & Cons”
Reviews.Author: surreytim
Reviews.Content: great stay hotel last november penthouse suite excellent stunning views city canal good breakfast including kinds breads fresh best hotel location close dam square major attractions walking everything use tram line see beautiful romantic city europe

Reviews.Title: “Totally Awesome!”
Reviews.Author: iamsterdamed
Reviews.Content: hi went amsterdam long weekend returning november 2007 value money hotel great central comfortable friendly staff helpful full good advice noise outside surely staying town theres going enjoyed hearing trams bustle town surely go city break experience city life goes room bit strange lay functional served purpose beds really comfortable rooms warm clean breakfast varied full english filling pastries toast fruit toast eggs cereals tea juice cheese etc want quiet holiday dont go amsterdam full character life would recommend staying hotel good location

Reviews.Title: “Great place for the money!”

Reviews.Content: dikker hotel beautiful hotel staff helpful breakfast excellant fresh fruit cereals hard eggs coffee teas fruit juices different types bread bedrooms comfortable clean big bed large pillows wanted take bed home location visiting sights perfect one way ann franks house van gogh museum everything walkable hotel also option tram stop outside hotel getting hotel tram stop tram 5 right outside door hotel central station also beautiful view canal read reviews hotels alot street noise well hotel none ever location perfect shopping eating middle excellant area shops restaurants reading alot reviews hotels amsterdam scared holiday going nightmare visiting hotel amsterdam city

Reviews.Title: “good...after a change of room!”
Reviews.Author: Henrythefish
Reviews.Content: american planning first trip amsterdam hotel perfect place stay went website found deal penthouse suite listed 2 night honeymoon package best deal found spending days online searching getting friends penthouse 45 star experience us travelers scale view huge room great king bed awesome view cool ac plasma tv panoramic view city decent bathroom mention view drawback otherwise excellent room warning lift goes floor 5 climb steep steps get penthouse 6th floor even push pull throw 5 bags steps room worth effort staff euro attitude smile helpful went extra mile help lost luggage location another big plus hotel located close museum district away crowded dam square packed central station area steps away cool leidseplein area short walk surrounded restaurants bars coffee shops highly recommend steps find less crowded local lots shopping kinds art galleries round excellent area explore amsterdam bonus hotel next main tram system quick albeit crowded ride central station amsterdam destinations staff even cut us deal 1 night return stay penthouse regular room rate end vacation 150 euro penthouse best bargain entire 3 week trip rest hotel amenities bar restaurant internet etc fine didnâ€™t use much since many choices right side front door visited several hotels considered staying none came even close location price american visiting amsterdam first time canâ€™t go wrong staying dikker thijs ask deals penthouse enjoy view

Reviews.Title: “Good value, great location”
Reviews.Author: Baldous
Reviews.Content: quick weekend trip really enjoyed stay clean charm friendly staff big rooms furniture rooms little dated loved great location price

Reviews.Title: “Highly Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: globalnomad59
Reviews.Content: stayed dikker thijs hotel 4 nights july 2007 room hotel clean staff helpful breakfast menu good hotel situated prinsengracht good location get attractions overlooked canal street busy spot tram line outside found first night rather noisy however walked following days local beers wines soon would reccomend visit anne frank house 30 minute walk away prepared queue hour get early also enjoyed visiting van gogh museum go visit cafe serve great food 10 minutes walk hotel put shabby appearance staff really nice helpful pancake bakery prinsengracht 45 minute walk away wonderful sweet restaurant serve wonderful food expensive worth trying 3 course tourist menu 20 euros good value enjoyed amsterdam certainly return

Reviews.Title: “Fall in love with Amsterdam and the hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: katerinaGR
Reviews.Content: others mention leidseplein easily keep awake 6am street trams start 7am hotel perfect balance old amsterdam charm modern efficiency may able get room back thats quieter would charm factor rate charge becomes big issue id imagine quieter want stay say april probably okay ideal clientele young people dont town party stay back hours go lunch sightseeing another evening repeat need quiet place sleep night need look elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “Canal view? -well a couple of garbage cans!”
Reviews.Author: Hegemonia
Reviews.Content: middle aged couple stayed 2 nights first room front first thought nice given view canal didnt think one morning would hearing crowds street outside even 6am could awful singing god save queen trouble room aircon window open next morning asked change room could get sleep next night first said full took lot part discovered another room room excellent ok back view considerably bigger first room quiet breakfast good location good walking centre also museums although far station summary lack aircon drawback makes rooms front hotel warm weather room back however excellent one get room called hotel travelling told room good refused guarantee particular room anyone would use hotel

Reviews.Title: “Had a nice stay”
Reviews.Author: CatsterLondon
Reviews.Content: stayed weekend truly recommend visit good value although sure 4 star def nicer side town right next tram link station breakfast typical continental rooms clean staff like people city friendly helpful

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!!”
Reviews.Author: QuDee
Reviews.Content: went two single women shared big comfortable bedroom everything described staff helpful excellent given free welcome drink area excellent great selection restaurants bars felt comfortable us away centre city trams stop right outside hotel frequent great stay definitely stay return

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: karussell
Reviews.Content: honeymoon may 2007 dikker thijs hotel best could done booked honeymoon package stayed penthouse suite great room huge double sitting area sitting area two table one sitting area dining table two dining chairs seperate space working desk seperate area bedroom bathroom 3 different rooms bath wc place sink place staff lots lots towels super clean bed sheets extremely clean carpet first time hotel room theres kettle room complimentary coffeetea also view say check photos one side room windows overlooking whole city canal romantic nice breakfast included theres plenty choose different kinds bread croissants rolls muffins various types cheeses ham cuts yoghurt cereals fruit different juices course coffee hot milk teas staff helpful friendly top top reservation location room main shopping street 1 min leidseplein walking distance shopping streets canal choose center town museums red district dam square theres lines 1 2 5 centraal station right outside stop called prinsengracht total highly recommended choise marvelous stay amsterdam

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Loch Lomond and The Trossachs National Park, United Kingdom
Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel and Location”
Reviews.Author: JaneF
Reviews.Content: girlfriend great expectations hotel mostly great reviews site decided book reasonably priced 4 star hotel cheap hotels amsterdam great location arrived rude clerk gave us room key mention room nonsmoking requested actually disappointment smoking room nothing compared view got couple garbage check pictures complained room help clerk extremely rude maybe bad day end vacation got sick terrible staff didnt let us stay room forced go need check every day everything ok room asked may made mistake putting although girlfriend almost first think absolutely rude people based bother seriously guess main thing got terrible room location great staff except one clerk friendly breakfast also good also room clean little bit noisy showers woke us every morning could hear guess great rooms hotel price cause seen beautiful pictures rooms site maybe unlucky risk take

Reviews.Title: “Dikker & Thijs”
Reviews.Author: esstenn
Reviews.Content: one smaller rooms although didnt spent lot time hotel nice stay good location clean rooms helpful friendly staff breakfast good day checked managed leave travel card behind room got back uk called hotel said kept post next day received 2 days later helpful nice keep seemed like peoples recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ricardfred
Reviews.Content: hotel excellent sunday easter days know quiet amsterdam got great room low price huge double huge corner overlooking prinsengracht theres lines 1 2 5 centraal station right outside stop called prinsengracht location close leidseplein even lazy museums really fantastic room clean decor tasteful really spacious unusual old houses amsterdam unbelievable view canal really nice big bathroom 2 sinks tub room located 3rd floor high enough also view nice feeling space air able window open without buzzing street theres kettle room complimentary coffeetea also beer alcohol took used fridge drinks food bought local supermarket price breakfast included buffet continental dont say anywhere unfortunately probably purpose even without bacon beans fried eggs theres plenty choose white dark bread croissants rolls muffins various cheese without ham cuts yoghurt cereals fruit different types juice course coffee hot milk yummy teas thing pot almost boiling water thats short description never seen security good ive amsterdam ive always stored valuables safe held close person went still felt bit unsafe place really felt didnt watch things time really nice course one never certainly felt didnt watch time

Reviews.Title: “OK Amsterdam hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: Voyager2005
Reviews.Content: loved dikker hotel perfect location could walk everything amsterdam doorstep superior room huge overlooked beautiful canal staff helpful friendly breakfast nice selection breads meats cheeses jams juice fruit boiled eggs yogurt cereal highly dikker anyone visiting amsterdam addition excellent services hotel reasonably priced

Reviews.Title: “high standard Dutch hotel but not a 4 stars”
Reviews.Author: chaoleonard
Reviews.Content: good value would recommend

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: rosa63
Reviews.Content: excellent hotel first location excellent literally stones throw tram stop also street awesome tons stores eateries shops anything could ask lots small bars including sports bars nightlife within easy walking 5 minutes friendly courteous moment walk tell hotel room clean big comfortable bed separate shower bathroom staying hotel london 4 nights best 2 nights sleep hotel return amsterdam definitely stay hotel strongly recommend others also hotel booking booked hotels used credit card simply hold room paid full card checkout also accomodated storing suitcase side room since arrived several hours earlier checkin time strongly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Took a chance on the D&T, and it paid off”
Reviews.Author: Logan69
Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights hotel lovely stay great location trams 1 2 5 stopping outside door prinsengracht stop dutch staff professional friendly booked double room bright modern spacious clean comfortable totally soundproofed although first floor trams passing never heard noise air conditioned window could opened bathroom also large bathtub powerful shower bed lovely slept well friend booked single room also spacious comfortable great view canal delighted definitely staying future never made breakfast due late nights dining room looked lovely room tea making facilities lovely shops nearby buy croissants etc secure room leave suitcase late flight home area beautiful safe lovely shops restaurants museums within minutes walking trams 1 2 5 tofrom central station take 10 minutes cost

Reviews.Title: “some good points & some not so good points.”
Reviews.Author: deenix
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel jan 2007 business fairly basic hotel nice touches booked superior double room large nice big bathroom lovely shower room 2 twin beds desk minibar tea coffee making facilities tv pay movies impressed tried sleep noise street comes mostly trams â€“ trams directions use 1 tram line stretch way coming ring bell fine â€“ except itâ€™s every 5 minutes midnight also lot noise party wander past 3am hotel seem done much try noise â€“ double glazing front desk girls fine friendly â€“ please try get manager terribly tried book night week told best rate twice expedia explained told book expedia directly wireless internet 6 euros per hour trams go right past â€“ blessing right heart lovely amsterdam centraal station 10 min tram ride away

Reviews.Title: “We will be back.....”
Reviews.Author: UMgirl
Reviews.Content: hotel right city center steps leidsplein historic building beautiful canal view prinsengracht pretty large single room bed normal size little shabby bathroom unhelpful kind breakfast dutch style without hot milk noise street keep windows closed dikker thijs hotel high standard hotels finally 4 stars hotel room minibar coffee tea kettle dirty security box customers wireless internet connection expensive
